data.title: History of the Za‘faran Monastery
data.abstractNote: Description: The location of the Zaʿfaran Monastery -- The Church of Mar Hananya -- The Sayyida (Virgin Mary) Church -- Church of the patriarchal throne -- The mausoleum, or burial chamber of fathers -- The paradise -- The origin of the Zaʿfaran Monastery -- Monasticism in Mardin and its outskirts -- The different names of the Zaʿfaran Monastery -- The biography of metropolitan Yuhanna of Mardin -- Yuhanna's narrative about the Zaʿfaran Monastery -- The rebuilding of the Zaʿfaran Monastery -- Biographies of the known superiors of the Zaʿfaran Monastery -- The monastic order of the Zaʿfaran Monastery in its early ages -- The Zaʿfaran Monastery as center of the Patriarchal See of Antioch -- The councils convened at the Zaʿfaran Monastery to elect patriarchs -- The names of patriarchs and maphryone ascribed to the Zaʿfaran Monastery -- The Metropolitans who graduated from the Zaʿfaran Monastery -- The fathers buried in the Zaʿfaran Monastery -- Patriarchs of Antioch -- The patriarchs of Tur ʿAbdin -- The Maphryone of the East -- The Metropolitans -- The councils convened at the Zaʿfaran Monastery and their canons -- Learning and learned men at the Zaʿfaran Monastery -- The library of the Zaʿfaran Monastery -- The properties of the Zaʿfaran Monastery -- The monasteries neighboring the Zaʿfaran Monastery -- The Sayyida Monastery -- Mar Jacob Monastery -- Mar ʿAzazel Monastery -- Mar Behnam Monastery -- Mardin : its diocese and bishops.
